oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Calf diarrhea diagnostics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Middleton, Gabe
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diarrhea
calves
diagnostics
prevention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The decision to submit calf diarrhea samples to a veterinary diagnostic lab can often be challenging. Balancing the value of the information with the ability to promote positive manage­ment changes is the conundrum the veterinarian often finds themself in. It is important for veterinarians to understand the available tests, interpret results properly, and convey those re­sults in a manner that promotes improvements in calf health.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 57 (2024): 2024 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 77
